response.overview: Dewi, an accomplished dancer, struggles with grief after her mother’s passing and feels overshadowed by her younger sister, Adelina, who inherits their family’s sacred tusuk rambut. Believing it to be her rightful legacy as the firstborn, Dewi grows resentful. As jealousy takes hold, she is haunted by a mysterious presence and turns to forbidden practices to reclaim the heirloom. Her desperation blurs the line between tradition and darkness, pushing her to make irreversible choices.
response.title: Follow My Lead
